Actions.Text: AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Relates to excise taxes on premium cigars
Summary: Provides that the tax on premium cigars shall be at the rate of seventy-five percent of the wholesale price or fifty cents, whichever is less, and is intended to be imposed only once upon the sale of any premium cigars; defines "premium cigar"; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to excise taxes on premium cigars; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
